properties.body:
BRAZIL-SOUTH COAST.
1. F/V PETER PAN II, ONE PERSON ON BOARD, UNREPORTED
   BETWEEN PONTA RASA (24-01.1S 046-18.8W)
   AND GUARUJA (24-24.0S 047-00.3W). VESSELS
   IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
   ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO ANY
   COASTAL RADIO STATION.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 1639/12(56), OPERATIONS COMPLETED.
